attributes.action: Right of Recourse for the Constituents of Aidan Burley MP
attributes.additional_details: Aiden Burley, already demoted from office has displayed behavior unbecoming of a member of this Parliament, and brought the institution into disrepute. A motion of no confidence should be called in order to provide his constituents with a member who will correctly represent their views. This petition calls for a by-election in his constituency before the term of this Parliament.
